tool_description: Find market trends by searching for news articles that mention percentage changes.
name: What Is Shaking- Market Trend Spotter
title: What Is Shaking- Market Trend Spotter
tool_name: What Is Shaking- Market Trend Spotter

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about percentage changes in financial news stories from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://what-is-shaking-market-trend-spotter.p.rapidapi.com/news/CNBC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "what-is-shaking-market-trend-spotter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
